loans.name: Kotognogontala  A Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe  Kotognogontala  A  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Konzanso, un des villages de la commune Urbaine de Sikasso 3ème région administrative du Mali : 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur quatrième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Minata  debout en première position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants et de semences agricoles pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 105.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Kotognogontala A Group are all married women who are, on average 43 years old and have four children.  They all live in polygamous families in the village of Konzanso, Urbaine commune, Sikasso (third administrative region of Mali).  

The women want to improve their agricultural businesses during the winter months, so they work with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso.  This will be their fourth loan, the previous loans were all fully and correctly repaid.

Minata (standing on the far left of the photo) grows maize.  She plans to use her loan to buy seed and other agricultural products for use on her one hectare of land.  She sells her produce in the village and at markets in Sikasso, to both men and women. 

Minata expects to earn an average profit of 105,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  She will use this to repay her loan and help her husband to provide for the daily expenses of their household.

loans.use: to buy seed and other agricultural products.

loans.name: Kotognogontala V Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe KOTOGNOGONTALA V sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans et ont en moyenne 4 enfants et vivant la plupart  dans des  familles traditionnelles à FACHORIBOUGOU un village dans la commune de KABOILA dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur onzième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec madame ASSANATOU débout à la deuxième position  de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme KOTOGNOGONTALA V. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 4 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 4 bidons d’herbicide et payer les frais de labour  pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village et à SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  140 000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son intérêt et d’autre part aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Kotognogontala V Group are all married women who are, on average, 33 years old and have four children.  Most of them live in traditional families in the village of Fachoribougou, Kaboila commune, Sikasso (third administrative region of Mali).

In order to improve their agricultural businesses during the winter months, the women work with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso.  This will be their eleventh loan, the previous loans were all fully and correctly repaid.

Assanatou (standing second from the left in the photo) grows peanuts.  She plans to use her loan to buy four 50kg sacks of fertilizer, four drums of herbicide, and pay the labour costs for one hectare of land.  She sells her produce in the village and in Sikasso, to both men and women, on a cash or credit basis.

Assanatou expects to make an average profit of 140,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  She will use this to repay her loan and interest, and help her husband to pay the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other agricultural products, and pay labour costs.

loans.name: Nelli

texts.en: Nelli lives in Armavir town with her three children (ages 16, 14 and 2 years old). She sells shoes in her shop. The assortment of shoes she sells in the store is not that big and needs to be updated and expanded periodically in order for her small business to be productive and compatible. Nelli currently needs a loan of USD 3,000 to buy new items (shoes) to resell in her store. Nelli and her family will be thankful to all the lenders for helping them to maintain their business.

loans.use: to pay for a new stock of shoes for her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, oil, soap, etc.

loans.name: Jose Oscar

texts.es: José tiene 58 años de edad y habita ne casa propia junto a su esposa. José es un hombre trabajador quien se dedica a la fabricación y venta de ladrillo. Tiene 40 años de contar con dicho negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día lo prefieren más. Su negocio de fabricación de ladrillo es su principal fuente de ingresos y es lo que le permite mantener la economía del hogar. José ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea invertir en su negocio con la finalidad de brindar un mejor servicio y llegar a más clientes. Con el monto solicitado comprará: barro, tierra, y de mas insumos para la fabricación de los ladrillos.
texts.en:
José is 58 years old and lives with his wife in his own house. José is a hard-working man who makes a living making and selling bricks. He has had this business for 40 years and so he has a lot of customers who increasingly prefer him. His brick-making business is his main source of income and enables him to provide for the household finances. 

José has decided to ask FUSAI for a loan because he wants to invest in his business to provide a better service and reach more customers. He will use the sum requested to buy clay,earth and other supplies for making the bricks.

loans.use: to buy clay, earth and other supplies for making bricks.

loans.name: Emprendedoras Del Valle El Triunfo Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por  5   mujeres  emprendedoras   y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “EMPRENDEDORES DEL VALLE DEL TRIUNFO”.  La Sra. LUCIA   de 51  años de edad casada y con 5 hijos, la Sra. Lucia   tiene una pequeña bodega (alquilado)  hace unos  9  años. La Sra. Lucia  con la ayuda de su familia a sabido salir adelante tanto así que  ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes   el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender su productos (azúcar, café, leche, arroz etc.) . Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más productos y así   seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes   y así poder salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. Lucia  y  todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado  y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. La Sra. Lucia   está parada  en el medio se le distingue por una polera de color rojo,  Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
The “EMPRENDEDORES DEL VALLE DEL TRIUNFO” communal bank is a group made up of 5 enterprising women who have a lot of creativity in their businesses. 

Lucia, who is 51 years old, is married with 5 children. She has rented a small shop for 9 years.With the help of her family she has worked out how to make progress, so much so that she now has loyal customers and this has generated profits which enable her to cover the household expenses. In future she would like to have a shop of her own where she can sell her products (sugar, coffee, milk, rice etc.)

She will use the loan provided to buy more products, thus continuing to meet her customers' needs and make progress.

Lucia and all of the members of the group are thankful to Kiva for the loan and for the confidence that they have shown by supporting them.

Lucia is in the centre of the photo in the red jumper. She signs off with the promise that she will meet all her repayment targets.

loans.use: to buy sugar, vegetable stew, milk etc.

loans.name: Aldo Javier

texts.es: El Señor Aldo es de Chuquisaca de estado civil soltero no tiene hijos, ya que no tiene muchos recursos solicita un préstamo para refaccionar  su vivienda, reside en un ambiente en la casa de sus padres, con las mejoras que desea realizar lograra tener mayor comodidad y podrá vivir mejor, ya que en épocas de lluvia él se ve más afectado. El señor demuestra ser una persona trabajadora, desde muy joven empezó con sus trabajos y se hizo independiente, cubre todos sus gastos y tambien ayuda a su familia, actualmente desempeña la labor de transportista público para una línea de taxi trufi de manera eficiente y responsable.
texts.en:
Aldo is from Chuquisaca and is single with no children. Since he has few resources he is asking for a loan to refurbish his home. He lives in part of his parents' house and hopes that by making improvements he will be more comfortable and live better, since during periods of rain he is affected quite badly.

He has demonstrated that he is a hard-working person and he started working from a young age and became independent. He covers all of his own costs and also helps his family. He is currently working in public transport as a taxi driver and is efficient and responsible.

loans.use: to refurbish his home.

loans.name: Luvuno

texts.en:
Luvuno is married with three school going children, which is the reason for her hard work. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Luvuno has operated a cafe business, making comestibles like tea, beans and chapati (flat bread) for sale to passersby and neighbours. She cited seasonality as her major challenge.

With the loan, she wants to purchase a stock of goods, maize flour and wheat flour for the business. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of goods, maize flour and wheat flour for the business.

loans.name: Nyavula

texts.en:
Nyavula is a widowed woman with no children. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For over two years, she has operated a fruit and vegetable stall business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She also sells fish.

With the loan, she wants to purchase green vegetables, fruits, tomatoes, potatoes, onions and fish for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, fruits, tomatoes, potatoes, onions and fish for resale

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: El señor Angel y su esposa Noemí, viven en el municipio de Colomi;  ambos mayores de edad, de estado civil casados, económicamente son independientes, ambos se dedican a la agricultura. Siembran en terreno propio de 2 Hasy producen papa, papaliza y haba, con rotación de cultivos. Tienen experiencia en el rubro, además cuentan con cabezas de ganado 2 de engorde y 2 lecheras. El señor demuestra ser una persona responsable y trabajadora, como le faltan recursos solicita un crédito para la compra de 2 camiones de abono(gallinaza) y compra de semilla de papa para la siembra, de esta forma quiere incrementar su producción agrícola para mejorar su nivel de vida en beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Angel and his wife Noemí live in the town of Colomi. They are married and are both senior citizens. They are financially independent and both work in agriculture.

They have their own 2 hectare plot of land and grow potatoes, papaliza [a type of tuber] and broad beans using crop rotation. They have experience in the field and also have two cattle for fattening and 2 dairy cows. Angel has shown he is responsible and hard-working.

Since they have limited resources he is asking for a loan to buy 2 lorry loads of poultry manure and to buy seed potato for planting. By doing this he hopes to increase his agricultural production to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy 2 lorry loads of poultry manure and buy seed potatoes for planting.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria tiene 29 años, vive en la ciudad de Itá. Ella comenta que se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de comidas que ella misma hace y que luego sale a vender de forma ambulante.
Ella es una mujer muy dedicada y que está luchando para poder crecer y salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos varios, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos y demás, para poder seguir con la venta de sus comidas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Maria, 29, lives in the city of Ita. She sells all types of food which she prepares herself and then goes out to sell.

She is very dedicated and strives to succeed and get along. 

She is asking for a loan to buy various supplies such as meat, vegetables, condiments and other things, in order to be able to continue selling her meals. 

She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments and other things to make food to sell.

loans.name: Cristhian

texts.es:
El Sr. Cristhian tiene 33 años, está casado hace 11 años con la señora Elvira de 46 años, el matrimonio tiene un 1 hijo de 5 años que está empezando en la escuela, y está en preescolar.
El señor Cristhian es mecánico de vehículos desde hace 4 años, anteriormente trabajaba como empleado, pero luego se independizo para tener su propio taller que atiende en su casa, también realiza trabajos particulares a empresas que pide su apoyo para mantenimientos y reparación de su flota de vehículos. Él es una persona que se está esforzando mucho por poder salir adelante para ayudar a su familia y darles una vida digna.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para construir un tinglado para su taller, y así tener más comodidad que le permita mejorar la atención para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cristhian, 33, has been married for 11 years with Elvira, 46.  They have got one five-year-old son who is starting school at the moment, currently at kindergarten age.

Cristhian has been a car mechanic for four years.  He used to work as an employee, but then he became independent so he could have his own workshop, working from home.  He also does work for companies who ask for his help to repair and maintain their fleet of vehicles. 

He is a person who is working hard to forge a living to help his family and give them a decent life.

He is asking for a loan to buy building materials to construct a shed for his workshop so he will be able to work more comfortably and provide a better service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy building materials to build a shed.

loans.name: Ñepytyvo Group

texts.es:
El grupo Ñepytyvo está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Hicieron la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza de los 50 Indicadores, donde cada una podrá conocer su situación de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Myrian quien se está esforzando por poder salir adelante e ir mejorando cada día, todo a través de las capacitaciones y de  las Artesanía en barro que ella hace y expone, y el cual es su medio de vida, con el que ayuda a su familia.
La Sra. Myrian Solicita  este préstamo para la mandar construir su propio horno  lo que le ayudará a aumentar la producción y a mejorar sus ingresos, ya que ella misma hará de esa forma la cocción de sus artesanías en barro.
texts.en:
The Nepytyvo group are in their third loan cycle in the Women's Committee.  All the members work and help each other to get along. They did the poverty elimination survey in order to find out at what level they were in their own personal situations.

One of the members is Myrian who is striving to get ahead and improve each day.  She is doing this by using her skills in clay handicraft.  She makes things and sells them, which is her way of making a living to help her family.

Myrian is asking for a loan to build her own oven, which will help her increase production and improve her income.  Having this will allow her to bake her own work herself.

loans.use: to build an oven.

loans.name: Gumercinda

texts.es: Gumercinda es una persona que se esta esforzando por salir adelante, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en la compra de insumos para su despensa, ya que con ello pudo mejorar. Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar mas insumos para surtir su despensa, como ser verduras, enlatados, lácteos y demás insumos.
texts.en:
Gumercinda is a person who is working hard to get along in life.  She tells us that she used her last loan to buy supplies for her food store, which allowed her to improve. 

Now she is asking for a new loan to buy more supplies to stock her store, such as vegetables, tinned food, dairy products and other things.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, tinned food, dairy products and other food supplies.

loans.name: Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Luchadoras está en su ciclo número 1º del programa de comités, donde todas trabajan y a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo dentro del grupo van mejorando poco a poco. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza.
Carina es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a hacer comidas que ella misma hace y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante. Comenta que se ha hecho de muy buena clientela ya que sus comidas son muy ricas y aceptadas por sus clientes.
Pide este préstamo ya que Carina quiere comprar insumos para hacer sus comidas, ya que así podrá seguir luchando y tratando de mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group is called 'Luchadoras', and is in its first cycle of the committee program.  All the members work and thanks to their continued hard work and effort, the group are gradually improving. They are doing the poverty elimination survey.

Carina is one of the members.  She sells meals that she makes herself and then sells on the streets. She says that she has a good customer base as her meals are delicious and enjoyed by her customers.

She is asking for this loan to buy supplies to make her meals and be able to continue striving to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make meals.

loans.name: Kuña Rory Group

texts.es:
El comité Kuña Rory está en el 2do. ciclo con 16 integrantes, es un grupo muy animado, donde todas trabajan unidas apoyándose mutuamente para salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes la señora Maria, es una señora muy activa, tiene una despensa en su casa en donde vende todo tipo de productos, ella se destaca por su amabilidad y carisma. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos varios para la venta, como ser frutas, verduras, comestibles en general, balanceados, carne, helados, etc.
Agradecen todas por esta oportunidad que están recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo y luchando para poder ayudar a sus familias.
texts.en:
The committee 'Kuna Rory' is in its second cycle.  There are 16 members so it is a lively group.  Everybody works and helps each other to get along.

One of the members is Maria.  She is a very active person who has a grocery store in her house where she sells all types of products.  She stands out for her friendly service and charisma. 

She is asking for this loan to buy a variety of products to sell such as fruit, vegetables, foodstuffs in general, pet food, meat, ice-cream, etc.

She is grateful for the opportunity she gets to continue growing as a business and striving to be able to help her family.

loans.use: to buy general grocery products.

loans.name: San Pedro Y Pablo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Pedro y San Pablo se formó en la ciudad, una zona bastante alejada de la capital, la mayoría de ellas se dedican a actividades rurales, son muy mujeres muy sacrificadas y luchadoras.
La Sra. Evarista es una de las integrantes, ella es  de la ciudad de Curuguaty donde tiene su pequeño negocio de despensa, comenta que por medio de su pequeño negocio da a su familia lo que necesitan para el día a día. Comenta que al principio le fue un poco difícil, pero que después se fue abriendo camino y hoy día ya tiene una clientela bien formada.
Evarista pide este préstamo para la compra de bebidas, verduras, frutas, carnes y demás productos para poder seguir con sus ventas, para dar a sus clientes lo que buscan y ella poder seguir mejorando.
texts.en:
This group is called 'San Pedro and San Pablo' and it was formed in a city quite a way away from the capital.  Most of the women do rural activities.  They are hard-working and determined.

Evarista is one of the members.  She is from Curuguaty where she has a small grocery store.  This helps her to provide for her family day to day. At the start it was a bit hard but after that she managed to establish herself and now she has got a steady customer base.

She is asking for this loan to buy drinks, fruit, vegetables, meat and other products to continue with her sales and offer the customers all that they need.  This will help her business continue to improve.

loans.use: to buy drinks, vegetables, fruit, meat and other products.

loans.name: Abdulvohid

texts.ru: Абдулвохид учится на втором курсе очного отделения Кургантюбинского Государственного Университета. Он будущий технолог. Абдулвохид родом из района Вахш. Ему 19 лет. Он живет с родителями и сестрами. Его отец и мать занимаются животноводческой деятельностью. Абдулвохид любит своих родителей и по выходным помогает им в сельском хозяйстве. К тому же Абдулвохид хорошо учится в университете, он с интересом осваивает предметы по своей специальности. Он хочет успешно окончить учебу и получить диплом, однако сейчас ему необходимо оплатить за ежегодное обучение в ВУЗе и для этого ему не хватает 800 долларов США. Эту сумму Абдулвохид просит в кредит и надеется, что его поддержат.
texts.en: Abdulvohid is attending a second year of the full-time department at the Qurgan-Tube State University. He is a future technologist. Abdulvohid is from the Vakhsh district. He is 19 years old. He lives with his parents and sisters. His father and mother are involved in animal husbandry. Abdulvohid loves his parents and helps them with the agricultural business on weekends. In addition, Abdulvohid studies well in the university; he learns subjects in his specialty with interest. He wants to finish his studies successfully and receive his diploma, but now he needs money to pay for his annual tuition at the university and he is short 800 US dollars. Abdulvohid is requesting this amount as a loan and hopes that he will be supported.

loans.use: to pay for his annual tuition at the university

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
El comité SAN MIGUEL es de la ciudad de  Lambaré, donde cada una está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder salir adelante y ayudarse las unas a las otras por medio del esfuerzo en conjunto.
Se destaca la Sra. Maxima, quien se dedica a la venta de bebidas varias, es una mujer muy luchadora y sacrificada que está saliendo adelante por medio del trabajo, y comenta que por medio de este está dando a su familia todo lo que necesitan para un día a día sin privaciones ni necesidades. Maxima sueña con poder tener una bodega amplia donde tener gran variedad de bebidas que ofrecer a sus clientes.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas varias para la venta, ya que de esta forma podrá seguir luchando por mejorar.
texts.en:
The 'San Miguel' committee is from the city of Lambare.  Each member is working hard to get ahead and they help one another making a group effort.

Maxima is a woman who stands out.  She sells a variety of drinks.  She is a hard-working woman who gives everything to make progress through her work.  She tells us that this is how she can provide her family with all that they need, and that they never want of anything. 

Maxima dreams of having a store with a wide variety of drinks to offer to her customers.

She is asking for this loan to buy a selection of drinks to sell.  This will allow her to continue improving.

loans.use: to buy a variety of drinks to sell.

loans.name: Jhonatan Jesus

texts.es:
Jhonatan es soltero y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Desde hace algún tiempo este joven emprendedor trabaja como operario en una prestigiosa empresa Textil.
Cada día lucha con gran empeño para poder ahorrar su dinero y darle a su madre todo lo que ella se merece.
Es una persona muy responsable, carismática, amable. Una de sus metas es poder estudiar una carrera Universitaria, es por eso que ahorra una parte del dinero que gana en el trabajo.
Jhonatan está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que con el apoyo brindado el podrá remodelar su casa y así sentirá mayor seguridad,  comodidad, mejorará su calidad de vida, y seguirá esforzándose para cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Jhonatan is single and lives in Ica with his family.

For a while now, this young entrepreneur has been working as a machine worker in a prestigious textile company.

Every day he strives to save money so that he can give his mother everything she deserves.

He is a very responsible, charismatic and friendly person. One of his goals is to be able to study a University degree, which is why he saves part of the money he earns from work.

Jhonatan is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with their help he can refurbish his home and feel safer, more comfortable and improve his quality of life.  He will continue to work hard to accomplish his goals.

loans.use: to refurbish his house to make it more secure and comfortable.

loans.name: Royerd Nicolas

texts.es: El Señor Royer es una persona humilde, trabajadora, hogareña y responsable; tiene su esposa y un hijo, son muy unidos y el es el sosten de su familia; estudio hasta el bachillerato y tiene mucha ganas de superarse y sacar a su familia adelante; actualmente trabaja de jornalero agricultor en el mantenimiento y cosecha de flores del chaco de su tio, donde percibe un salario quincenal para mantener a su familia y poco a poco se fue construyendo una pequeña vivienda en el lote que le otorgo su mamá, el cual se vio afectado por las lluvias que hubo, las mismas ocacionaron algunos daños a su vivienda, por ello solicita un credito para la reparacion de su vivienda, de esta forma podra mejorar las condiciones en las que vive su familia.
texts.en:
Royer is a humble person who is hard-working, home-loving and responsible.  He is married and has one child.  They are very united as a family and he is the person who provides for them.  He studied until the end of high school and really wants to improve so he can look after his family better.  

At the moment he is working as an agricultural laborer, maintaining and harvesting the flowers on his uncle's plot of land.  He earns a salary every two weeks which he uses to help his family.  

Little by little, he has been building a small house on a plot of land given to him by his mother.  Unfortunately, it has been affected by the recent rain and it has suffered some damage.  

For this reason, he is asking for a loan to repair the home, and improve the conditions that his family live in.

loans.use: to repair his home.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: La señora Isabel, de 53 años de edad, soltera, no cuenta con hijos ni personas dependientes de sus ingresos, se dedica a la producción de leche desde hace 30 años, para lo cual cuenta con 7 cabezas de ganado vacuno lechero, de los cuales 6 se encuentran en producción y 1 se encuentra preñada, de esta manera genera sus ingresos, el motivo de la presente solicitud de ayuda económica se debe a que tuvo gastos inesperados, invirtió gran parte de su dinero en la ampliación y remodelación de su vivienda por las fuertes lluvias en meses anteriores que  afectaron gran parte de la construcción y  se vio obligada a realizar mejoras en su casa, el crédito que solicita esta destinado para la compra de insumos para ganado vacuno lechero (cascara de soya y forraje), para que no disminuya su producción de leche y pueda mantener el nivel de sus ingresos con objeto de satisfacer todas sus necesidades económicas.
texts.en:
Isabel, who is 53 years old, is single and has no children or other financial dependents. For 30 years she has made a living from milk production and to do this she has 7 dairy cows. At the moment one of them is pregnant and the other 6 are producing milk. This is how she makes her income.

The reason for this loan request is that she has had unexpected expenditure. She used a large proportion of her money to extend and refurbish her home because of the heavy rains in previous months which affected a large part of the construction, such that she was obliged to carry out some improvements to the house.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies for the dairy cattle (soybean hulls and fodder), so that her milk production does not decrease and she can maintain her income level, which will satisfy all of her financial requirements.

loans.use: to buy supplies for dairy cattle (soybean hulls and fodder).

loans.name: Madelyn Vanessa

texts.es:
Madelyn de 20 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está soltera y no tiene hijos, vive con sus abuelos y es una joven con deseos de superarse.
 
El negocio en el que trabaja, es una ferretería, tiene dos años de experiencia en ventas, un tío suyo es el dueño de la ferretería, por lo que tiene toda la oportunidad de aprender lo más que pueda, la necesidad que tenía su tío de una empleada la llevó a dedicarse a esto, para llegar al lugar de trabajo recorre una distancia de 15 kilómetros por lo que se transporta en bus y el horario o es de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm.

El préstamo lo necesita para ampliar más el negocio de una tienda, ya que las ventas son buenas, comprará productos que más demandan los clientes, productos descartables, material de plástico etc. lo que le permitirá tener una fuente de ingreso propia, ya no tendrá que estar viajando para poder tener sus ingresos.

Su sueño es poco a poco ir aumentando las ventas de la tienda, tener una estabilidad para cuando decida formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Madelyn is 20 years old and has completed high school. She is single and has no children, and lives with her grandparents. She wants to make progress in life. She works in a hardware store and has 2 years' experience in sales. One of her uncles is the owner of the hardware store and so she has every opportunity to learn as much as she can. She started doing this work when her uncle was looking for someone to work for him. She travels 15km by bus to get to work and her working day is from 8am to 4pm.

She needs the loan to further expand her shop, since her sales are good. She will buy products which the customers ask for the most, such as disposable products, plastic items etc. This will enable her to have her own source of income and she won't have to travel to earn an income.

Her dream is to gradually increase the shop's sales and to have stability for when she starts a family of her own.

loans.use: to expand her shop by buying products the customers want such as disposable items and plastic items.

loans.name: Norah

texts.es:
Norah esta casada, vive en casa de un  familiar, con su esposo y su hija menor, en la zona de tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz.
 
Actualmente se dedica a la venta de pescado de todo tipo en la puerta de su casa, con esta actividad ella ayuda a su esposo y mantienen  a su familia; Norah solicita crédito para mejorar su puesto de venta de pescado: sillas, mesas e incluso ollas pues también ha decidido vender platos de pescado. Por ejemplo el ispi (un pez parecido a las anchoas tiene gran aceptación en el mercado.

El sueño de Norah es poder comprarse su casita y tener un restaura
texts.en:
Norah is married. She lives in a relative's house with her husband and her youngest daughter in the Tembladerani area in the city of La Paz. 

Currently, she makes a living selling all kinds of fish from the door of her house. With this activity, she helps her husband and they support their family. 

Nora is asking for the loan to improve her fish stall by buying chairs and tables as well as pans. This is because she has also decided to sell fish dishes, such as 'ispi', a fish similar to anchovy which is very popular locally.

Nora's dream is to buy her little house and have a restaurant.

loans.use: to improve her fish stall by buying chairs and tables as well as pans.

loans.name: Kotognogontala  4 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe  Kotognogontala  4  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à Konzanso, un des villages de la commune urbaine de Sikasso 3ème région administrative du Mali : 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs avec Assitan assise en deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants et de semences agricoles pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 95.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Kotognogontala 4 group are married women who on average are 45 years old with five children. They all live in polygamous families in Konzanso, one of the villages in the Sikasso municipality, in the third administrative region of Mali.

They have been working with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution to carry out their farming activities during the rainy season. They are on their fifth loan with the institution, and all previous loans have been repaid in full.

The selected crop is maize featuring Assitan, who is sitting in the second position from left to right in the picture. She will use her loan to buy agricultural inputs and seeds to maintain one hectare (about 2.47 acres).

After harvest the crop is sold at village level in the markets of Sikasso, to a clientele composed of men and women, for cash and on credit.

She expects to make an average profit of 95,000 CFA francs per growing season. This profit will enable her to pay off the loan, and also help her husband with daily expenses.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand and cement to plaster the walls of a room.

loans.name: Jean Marie Vianne

texts.en:
Jean Marie Vianne is 31 years old. He will use this Kiva loan to pay for labor costs and buy fertilizers during rice production. He needs to buy fertilizers in order to increase his production. With the profits from his farming, Jean Marie Vianne wishes to invest in his business so that in the future he can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance his farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under-served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizers and pay for labor costs during rice production.

loans.name: Celestin

texts.en:
Celestin is 29 years old. He will use his Kiva loan to pay for labor costs and buy fertilizers during rice production. Celestin needs to buy fertilizers in order to increase his production. With the profits from his farming, Celestin wishes to invest in his business so that in the future he can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance his farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters and price fluctuations. loans.name: Felicien

texts.en:
Felicien is 29 years old. He is single and has been a rice farmer for the past two years. He will use his Kiva loan to pay for labor costs and buy fertilizers during rice production. Felicien needs to buy fertilizers in order to increase his production. With the profits from his farming, Felicien wishes to invest in his business so that in the future he can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance his farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under-served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizers and pay for labor costs during rice production.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana de 42 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, se casó desde muy joven pero ahora está separada, solo tiene un hijo el cual trabaja, y nadie más vive con ellos.
   
Ana es vendedora de productos de revista (cosméticos, perfumes etc.) cuenta con una experiencia de seis años, una amiga le introdujo a esta actividad, considerando que con su esfuerzo lograría más ingresos para el hogar, también hace venta de tamales, ella vende de casa en casa por toda la comunidad donde vive, la actividad la realiza ella sola y tiene un horario de 9:00 AM a 3:00 PM.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar  más mercadería,  el mejoramiento será poder vender a muchos más clientes, con lo que obtendrá más ingresos, la necesidad satisfecha será pagar una deuda de mercadería que había adquirido, tener su propio capital de trabajo. 

Sueña con lograr ser una vendedora de prestigio, y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Ana, 42, finished sixth grade. She married when she was very young but now is separated. She has one son who works and no longer lives with her.

Ana is a vendor of catalog products (cosmetics, perfumes, etc.). She has six years experience. A friend introduced her to this work, considering that with effort she would earn more income for the home. Also, she sells tamales. She sells from house to house throughout the community where she lives. She does this work alone from 9AM to 3PM.

She needs the loan to buy more merchandise. The improvement will be to be able to sell to many more customers so she will obtain more income. The satisfied need will be to pay a debt of merchandise that she had acquired so she has her own working capital.

She dreams of becoming a prestigious sales woman and to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her shop.

loans.name: Liliana Luz

texts.es:
Liliana es una emprendedora mujer de 32 años con miras al futuro y con ganas de salir adelante.
Ella viene dedicándose a la compra y venta de distintos tipos de mercancía como ropa, alguna juguetería, accesorios de belleza y para el hogar, entre otros. Esta actividad la aprendió de su madre quien es comerciante desde hace mucho tiempo.
Liliana con el afán de buscar nuevos clientes y aumentar sus ingresos, solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido en ropa y calzado para ofrecer a su clientes y aumentar su inventario. Esto le dará la oportunidad de competir con mas fuerza en el sector ya que hay varias personas que se dedican a lo mismo.
Su mayor sueño es poder independizarse completamente y comprar casa propia.
texts.en:
Liliana is an entrepreneurial 32 year old woman with an eye on the future and a desire to get ahead. She is dedicated to buying and selling different types of merchandise such as clothing, some toys, beauty and home accessories, among other items. She learned this work from her mother who has been a trader for some time. Liliana, with the eagerness to find new customers and expand her income, is requesting a loan to buy more stock of clothing and shoes to offer to her customers and expand her inventory. This will give her the opportunity to compete more strongly in the sector since there are many people who are dedicated to the same work.

Her biggest dream is to be able to become completely independent and to buy her own house.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing and shoe stock to sell.

loans.name: Unidos Venceremos  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En la Ciudadela del Maestro de la ciudad de  Portoviejo capital manabita, conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los Reales Tamarindos, cada 15 días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Unidos Venceremos.
Este es un grupo de personas formado por 13 mujeres y 2 hombres que tiempo atrás decidieron unirse y formar este grupo con el cual se han ayudado mucho para salir adelante, ellos se dedican a diferentes actividades como comercio, ventas, producción y  servicios.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Isela, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun  viven con ella, su esposo trabaja para el Estado. Ella desde muy joven aprendió belleza por lo que se graduó en una academia como estilista.
Doña Isela  es una mujer que siempre le ha gustado trabajar para así salir adelante y con el fruto de su esfuerzo ayudar con los gastos que generan el estudio de sus hijos, ella tiene un salón de belleza en el cual realiza diversos trabajos de belleza y arreglo personal. Trabaja todos los días desde las 9h00 hasta las 21h00 y si algún cliente requiere  de sus servicios hasta más tarde ya que esto no le incomoda porque su salón lo tiene en su casa, trabaja con una chica a la cual le paga por sus servicios. Ella además de realizar sus trabajos también vende productos  dietéticos y de cuidado personal, lleva más de 7 años con su labor la cual le encanta.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar productos como tintes, cremas, adelgazantes, entre otros productos que ella vende. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus metas son tener un SPA completo con todo.
La foto pequeña es de tres socias que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
Every 15 days, the "United We'll Conquer" loan group meets in the Maestro Citadel in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabi, known for many years as the city of the Royal Tamarind. This is a group of people made up of 13 women and two men, who a while ago decided to unite and form this group with which they have helped each other get ahead. They are dedicated to different work such as trade, sales, production and services.

One of the members of this group is Isela. She is 45 years old, married and, from this relationship, has four adult children. Two of them still live with her. Her husband works for the State. Since she was very young, she learned beautician skills and she graduated from an academy as a stylist. Isela is a woman who has always liked to work to get herself ahead and, with the fruit of her labors, helped to pay the education expenses of her children. She has a beauty salon where she performs different grooming and beauty work. She works every day from 9AM until 9PM and if a customer needs her services later, this does not inconvenience her since her salon is in her house. She works with a young lady who she pays for her services. As well as her work, she also sells diet products and personal care products. She has more than seven years experience with her work, which she loves.

This loan will be used to buy products like dyes, creams and slimming products, among other products that she sells. She has been with the loan group since the beginning and she likes it because of the help the loans provide. Her goal is to have a complete spa. The small photo is of the three members who could not be present when they took the group photo.

loans.use: to buy dyes, creams and slimming products.

loans.name: Arouna

texts.fr:
Monsieur AROUNA est né en 1967 à ZOUMANA DIASSA, polygame et père de 9 enfants il réside avec ses épouses et leurs enfants dans une grande famille traditionnelle à ZOUMANA DIASSA dans la commune de KLELA  cercle de SIKASSO troisième région administrative de la république du Mali.
Monsieur AROUNA n’ayant pas eu la chance d’avancer dans les études,  s’est initié aux activités de travaux champêtre et décida de  collaborer avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien son activité agricole pendant l’hivernage.  Il jouit d’une forte réputation. Il est avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso il y a 4 ans et est à son quatrième prêt de production de maïs  qui lui permettra d’augmenter son fonds  initial pour en fin répondre aux attentes de ses clients.
La spéculation cultivée est de maïs, ainsi ce quatrième prêt lui permettra d’acheter,16 sacs d’engrais et 30 bidons d’herbicide de qualité différente pour entretenir  4 hectares.
 Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  670 000 FCFA par campagne. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son intérêt et d’autre part de résoudre  les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Arouna was born in 1967 in Zoumana Diassa.  He is a polygamous man, has nine children and lives with them and his wives in a large traditional family in Zoumana Diassa, Klela commune, Sikasso (third administrative region of the Republic of Mali).  Arouna did not have the opportunity to continue with his education, so he began working in the fields. He has an excellent reputation. 

Arouna would like to improve his agricultural business during the winter months, so he has been working with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso, for four years. This will be the fourth loan that he uses for the production of maize.  The loan will enable him to increase his capital funds and respond to the demands of his customers.  Arouna plans to use this fourth loan to buy sixteen sacks of fertilizer and thirty drums of herbicide of various quality.  He will use them to care for his four hectares of land.  He sells his produce in the village and at markets in Sikasso, to both men and women, for cash or on credit.

Arouna expects to make an average profit of 670,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  This will enable him to repay his loan and interest, and provide for the day-to-day expenses of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides for his agriculture business.

loans.name: José Abilio

texts.es:
José tiene 27 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, luego estudió dos años en la universidad, pero decidió dedicarse a trabajar, su pareja es ama de casa, no tiene hijos todavía, y vive con sus padres y esposa.

José es empleado de una empresa de acueductos y alcantarillados, su padre trabaja desde 1998 en la institución y fue él quien le consiguió el puesto, tiene cuatro años de experiencia, el trabajo lo aprendió recibiendo instrucciones de su padre y fijándose como se realizaba, no tenía más actividades a las  que se dedicara, el trabajo lo lleva a diferentes lugares, ya que va donde  está la necesidad de atención de las personas, cuando debe ir a algún lugar lejos usa un vehículo y cuando es cerca se va en bicicleta, su horario de trabajo son 24 horas seguidas y descansa otras 24.

El préstamo será invertido para comprar materiales de construcción (cemento, arena, hierro, bloque, pago de mano de obra etc.) ya que junto a su padre desean construir un cuarto más en su casa.

Su sueño es tener primero lo más necesario para cubrir las necesidades e irse haciendo poco a poco de sus cosas, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida, el préstamo le ayudará en satisfacer la necesidad de construir el cuarto de habitación que está necesitando, con esto tendrá más privacidad.
texts.en:
José is 27 years old; he completed high school then studied at university for two years, but decided to work.  His partner is a homemaker.  They do not have children yet and he lives with his parents and his spouse. 

José works for an aqueduct and sewage system company.  His father has worked at this business since 1998 and he was the one who got him the job.  He has four years of experience; he learned the work by receiving instructions from his father and paying attention to how they were carried out.  He did not do any other kind of work.  This job takes him different places, as he goes where people need service; when he has to go far he uses a car and when it is close he goes on bicycle.  His schedule is 24 hours in a row then 24 hours off.

This loan will be invested in construction materials (cement, sand, iron, cement blocks, labor costs, etc.) as he and his father want to build another room in their home. 

His dream is first of all to have what is most necessary to cover the necessities and to add on to that little by little, which is why he hopes to work as long as God grants him health and life.  This loan will help him fulfill the necessity of building a bedroom that he needs, which will give him more privacy.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, iron, cement blocks, labor costs, etc.) as he and his father want to build another room in their home.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es: Gabriel, tiene 48 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos, reside en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa, cerca a Peña Blanca. Tiene varios años de dedicarse a la  agricultura, cultivando pataste, esta producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona. Con el fin de aumentar la cosecha y los ingresos ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 20,000 Lempiras para comprar los insumos, fertilizantes, abonos etc. para darle mantenimiento al cultivo de pataste, ya que su propósito es seguir adelante con sus metas y planes de crecer con esta actividad.
texts.en: Gabriel, 48, is married. He has two children. He resides in a village that belongs to the town of Santa Cruz de Yojoa near Peña Blanca. He has been dedicated to farming for many years, growing chayote. He sells his production in the area's market. With the goal of expanding his crop and his income, he has decided to request a loan of 20,000 lempiras to buy inputs, chemical and organic fertilizers, etc. to maintain his chayote crop since his goal is to move forward with his goals and plans to grow with this work.

loans.use: to buy inputs and fertilizers to maintain his crop of chayote.

loans.name: Binafou

texts.fr:
Monsieur BINEFOU est né en 1959 à KOYERE DIASSA. Il est polygame, père de 9 enfants et réside avec ses épouses et leurs enfants dans une grande famille traditionnelle à KOYERE DIASSA FASSOUMBOUGOU cercle de SIKASSO troisième région administrative de la république du Mali.
Monsieur BINEFOU n’ayant pas eu la chance d’avancer aux études, il s’est initié dans l’activité de travaux champêtre d’où il collabore avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien son activité agricole pendant l’hivernage.
Avec une grande expérience dans ce domaine, il jouit d’une forte réputation. Ainsi, il rejoint à l'institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso il y a 2 ans et avec laquelle il sollicite ce deuxième prêt de production de maïs. La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs.
Il compte acheter  12 sacs d’engrais, 20 bidons d’herbicide de qualité différente et payer les frais de labour  pour entretenir  3 hectares.
 Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village et à SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
Il compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  470 000 FCFA par campagne. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son interêt et d’autre part de résoudre les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Binefou was born in 1959 in Koyere Diassa.  He is a polygamous man, has nine children and lives with them and his wives in a large, traditional family in Koyere Diassa Fassoumbougou, in Sikasso (third administrative region of the Republic of Mali).  Binefou did not have the opportunity to continue with his education, so he began working in the fields.  He has a lot of experience in his business and benefits from a strong reputation.

Binefou would like to improve his agricultural business during the winter months, so he began working with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso, two years ago.  This will be his second loan for the production of maize.  He plans to use his loan to buy twelve sacks of fertilizer, twenty drums of herbicide of varying quality, and pay for the labour costs to work his three hectares of land.  He sells his produce in the village and throughout Sikasso, to both men and women, for cash or on a credit basis.

Binefou expects to earn an average profit of 470,000 francs CFA over the loan period.  This will enable him to repay his loan and interest, and provide for the day-to-day expenses of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides, and pay for labour costs for his agricultural business.

loans.name: Reynaldo Raul

texts.es: Reynaldo, tiene 24 años de edad, esta soltero, vive con su madre y una hermana en el Municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. El trabajo unos años como promotor en una oficina municipal y hace mas de un año decidió dedicarse a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. Esta venta la realiza de manera ambulante y por pedidos. Además, también elabora y vende tajadas de plátano o banano. El quiere superarse, tener estabilidad económica y para eso ha solicitado un préstamo por 10,000 lempiras para surtir el negocio de ropa como blusas, camisas, pantalones, vestidos y ropa para niño. Su plan a futuro es lograr tener un local propio y estar bien económicamente con su familia.
texts.en: Reynaldo is 24 years old, single, and lives with his mother and a sister in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara.  He worked as a promoter at a municipal office for a few years and over a year ago he decided to sell women's, men's, and children's clothing for a living.  He does his sales on foot and by order.  Additionally, he also makes and sells sliced plantains or bananas.  He wants to better himself, have financial stability, and to do this he has requested a loan for 10,000 lempiras to stock his business with clothing, such as blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, and children's clothing.  His plan for the future is to have his own store and to be in good financial shape with his family.

loans.use: to buy clothing, such as blouses, pants, dresses, shirts, and children's clothing to sell

loans.name: Sonia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 33 años de edad, estudió hasta  segundo año de licenciatura en contaduría, por cuestiones económicas no pudo continuar, por lo que se dedicó a trabajar, está soltera y vive con su madre y una tía. 

Ella es empleada, trabaja en una oficina de abogados, se desempeña como secretaria  es la que lleva todos los controles del trabajo, tiene más de cinco años de dedicarse a su trabajo, cuenta con bastante experiencia por lo que la hace una empleada eficiente y eficaz, el trabajo lo consiguió presentando su currículo y al tener más ventaja sobre experiencia la contrataron, anteriormente trabajaba en una librería,  el trabajo le queda a un kilómetro de distancia y el recorrido lo hace en bus, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm.

El préstamo será invertido en la preparación de la  tierra, para la siembra, en la compra de insumos y en el pago de la mano de obra, el trabajo se lo administra un tío, por lo que ella solo inspecciona, su madre es quien le pide que se encargue de la administración de los bienes de familia.

Su sueño es poder tener primero lo más necesario para ayudarle a su madre, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida.
texts.en:
Sonia is 33 years old.  She studied through her second year of accounting school, but for financial reasons she could not continue, which is why she started working.  She is single and lives with her mother and an aunt.  

She is employed; she works at a lawyer's office as a secretary and she is the one who monitors all the work.  She has worked at this job for over five years; she has a good amount of experience, which is why she is a productive and efficient employee.  She got this job after submitting her CV and she was hired because she had the advantage of experience.  Before this she worked at a bookstore.  Her job is one kilometer away and she commutes on the bus.  Her schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

Her loan will be invested in preparing land for planting, buying supplies, and paying for labor.  An uncle will oversee the work for her so she will only check on it.  Her mother is the one who asked her to take on the administration of her family's properties.

Her dream is to be able to have what she most needs to help her mother, which is why she hopes to work as long as God grants her health and life.

loans.use: to prepare her land for planting, to buy supplies, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to tend to her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy manioc and fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stock of tyres.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil.

loans.name: Ben Yiriwaton Group

texts.fr:
Les 2 membres du groupe BEN YIRIWATON sont des hommes mariés  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 51 ans et ont en moyenne 8 enfants et vivant la plupart  dans des  familles traditionnelles à  N'GOLO- DIASSA  un village dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Ils collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Ils sont à leur deuxième prêt de production de maïs avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  le maïs  avec monsieur KARIM débout de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, il compte acheter 8 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 8 bidons d’herbicide et payer les frais de labour  pour entretenir  2 hectares. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village et à SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  350 000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et et faire face aux dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The two members of the Ben Yiriwaton group are married men who are on average aged 51 years with eight children. They live mostly in traditional families in N'Golo-Diassa, a village in the Sikasso area in the third administrative region of Mali.
They collaborate with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution in order to manage their agricultural affairs during the winter. This is their 10th loan for the production of corn with the institution, the previous loans were repaid correctly. The crop cultivated by Mr. Karim, is corn. He is standing on the left in the photo. With his loan, he plans to buy eight sacks of 50 kg of fertiliser, eight cans of weed killer and to pay for labour to take care of two hectares.
After the harvest, the crop is sold in the village and in Sikasso to a mixed clientele for cash or for credit. 
He hopes to make an average profit of 350 000 FCFA per field. This profit will enable him to pay back his loan and cope with the daily family expenses.

loans.use: To buy fertiliser and weed killer and to pay for labour costs.

loans.name: Adrán

texts.es:
Adrián tiene 51 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, por cuestiones económicas  y necesidades en el hogar no pudo continuar, por lo que se dedicó a trabajar, está soltero y vive con su madre.

Él es cobrador en una ruta de pickup que se conducen desde un desvió hasta otro pueblo, le llamaba a atención esta actividad y entonces se fue involucrando,  tiene más de 4 años de dedicarse a la actividad, el trabajo lo tiene a unos 500 metros, el recorrido lo hace a pie y el horario es de 5:00 am a 4:00 pm.

El préstamo será invertido para preparar la  tierra para la siembra, comprar insumos y para el pago de la mano de obra.

Su sueño es tener lo más necesario para ayudarle a su madre, por lo que espera trabajar siempre.
texts.en:
Adrián is 51 years old. He went to school up to the ninth grade. due to financial issues and needs in the home, he was unable to continue. That is why he decided to work. He is single and lives with his mother.

He is the collector on a pickup route that goes from a back road to another town. The activity got his attention and then he got involved. He has been doing this activity for more than 4 years and his job is about 500 meters away. He gets there on foot and his schedule is from 5:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m.

The loan will be invested in preparing the soil for planting, buying materials and paying for labor costs.

His dream is to have every thing he needs to help his mother, and so he hopes to always be working.

loans.use: to prepare the soil for planting, buy materials and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Genush

texts.en:
Genush is an agronomist living in Goravan village with her husband and two children. Her elder son is employed in the private sector and works hard to earn a living for the family. Unfortunately his salary alone is not enough to fully cover their needs. Genush herself is engaged in agribusiness. She is involved in aviculture, and in the cultivation of tomato and eggplant. Her family helps her produce the agricultural products for the local market, which is a very important source of income for them. 

To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way Genush needs a loan of USD 3000 to renovate the barn, to purchase fertilizer, fuel and hire workers for harvesting. She and her family highly rely on the good will of the lenders and will be thankful to them for the support in collecting the needed loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the barn, fertilizer, fuel and hire workers for harvesting.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana es una tradicional mujer criada en el campo donde nacen los verdaderos luchadores pues diariamente tienen que sacar el alimento no solo para su familia si no para el resto de personas que se benefician de estos productos que se consumen diariamente.
Madre de 5 hijos, busco la manera de criarlos y alimentarlos para ello trabajo junto a su familia en un negocio de cría de cerdos pero hace 2 años comenzó su actividad como independiente lo que le ha traído grandes beneficios pues obtiene mayores ingresos y administra el negocio como ella le gusta.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de marranos los cuales engorda y posteriormente vende, también para la compra de cuido ya que le gusta alimentar a sus animales con productos de calidad que se evidencian en el sabor de sus carnes, con la ayuda de este crédito podrá  potenciar su negocio y ofertar a más personas a mejores precios ya que muchas personas en el sector están montando negocios similares y la competencia es cada vez más fuerte
texts.en:
Juana is a traditional woman raised in the country. That is where real fighters are raised. Every day she has to feed not only her family but everybody else who benefits from the products that are consumed daily. 

She is the mother of 5 children. She sought a way to raise them and feed them and to do that she worked with her family in a pig raising business. Two years ago, she started to work on her own and this has brought her a lot of benefits because she obtains more income and manages the business, which she likes. 

She is asking for a loan to buy the pigs, which she will fatten up and then sell. She also wants to buy the feed that she wants to give her animals. They are quality products that are evidenced by the flavor of the meat. With the help of this loan, she will be able to increase her business' potential and offer people better prices. A lot of people in the area are opening similar businesses and the competition is always getting stronger.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise and fatten up to later sell them, as well as feed for them.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy fish and palm oil.

loans.name: Sagrario Del Carmen

texts.es:
Sagrario de 63 años de edad,  estudio hasta 3º grado, esta acompañada, su pareja trabaja con ganado y la agricultura, tiene 4 hijos, uno vive en EEUU y los otros 3 están acompañados y tienen sus propios hogares. 

Con ella vive un nieto que esta estudiando. Sagrario se dedica a la fabricación y venta de tablillas y lo ha hecho por unos 3 años y lo aprendió de unas amigas y decidió dedicarse a este negocio porque se enfermo y perdió el empleo que tenia, solamente recibe la ayuda económica de un hijo que vive en EEUU, el negocio lo tiene en casa y la venta la llegan a traer a la casa. 

Dos hijas le ayudan consiguiendo clientes, su horario es variado. El préstamo que esta soliictando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar un servicio de agua potable, le mejorara sus condiciones de vida ya que podrá tener el servicio de agua potable en su hogar. 

 Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para ayudarle económicamente a su compañero de vida, y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sagrario is 63 years old. She went to school through the 3rd grade. She is married and her spouse works in farming and livestock. She has 4 children. One of them lives in the U.S.A. and the other 3 are married and have their own homes.

A grandson lives with her and he is in school. Sagrario works making and selling tablillas. She has dome this for 3 years and she learned it from some friends who worked in this business because she got sick and lost the job that she had. She only gets a little financial help from the son in the U.S.A.  She has her business in her house and people go there to buy the products. 

Two daughters help her get customers and her schedule is varied. The loan she is asking CREDICAMPO for is to pay for a potable water service. This will improve her quality of life in her home. 

Her dream is to keep working to help her life's companion and thus be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for a potable water service for her house.

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is a married woman with five school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past four years, she has operated a business of selling lesos ( women's wrap cloths). She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation. She dreams of expanding to become a big supplier of clothes in the future.

With the loan, she wants to purchase more pieces of leso ( women wrap cloth)  for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more pieces of leso (women's wrap cloth)  for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stock of cereals

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is married and has four school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

For the past seven years, she has operated a poultry selling business. She sells to her neighbours and passersby. Her major challenge is the high cost of transportation to her place of operation.

With the loan, she wants to purchase chicks and chicken feed. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and chicken feed

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine lives in Dvin village with her parents-in-law, brother-in-law, sister-in-law, and husband. Her family runs a farm. They cultivate tomatoes and grow fruit trees (apricot, peach). 

The gathered harvest they sell locally and gather income which is very important for their living. The requested loan of USD 3000 to pay for harvesting services and to  purchase fertilizer and fuel. As the life is getting more expensive with time, Karine wants to expand her agribusiness a little bit to more effectively address her family's needs. A loan of USD 3,000 will help her greatly. 

Karine and her whole family rely on the good will of the lenders and will be thankful to them for the support in collecting the needed amount of loan to sustain their agribusiness. As this is Karine's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products before, because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for harvesting services and to purchase fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Said

texts.en:
Said is a married man with four children, three of whom are in school. He lives in his own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

He has operated a kerosene-selling business for the past two years. He cites transportation costs as his major challenge.

He is requesting a loan to purchase gallons of kerosene for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase gallons of kerosene for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of peppers.

loans.name: Elice

texts.en:
Elice is a married woman with eight children. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.  Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past two years, she has been selling goats at the market to the general public. The main challenge for her business has been unstable market prices. 

She joined Yehu in order to gain access to funds.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more goats for resale.

loans.use: to purchase more goats for resale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards. She is requesting a loan to purchase chicks and chicken feed. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and chicken feed

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en:
Rashid is a married man who has been blessed with one child. He lives at his own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food.

Rashid operates a charcoal and coconut selling business, selling at the market to his neighbours and villagers. His greatest monthly challenge is high cost of transportation.

He wants to purchase more sacks of charcoal and coconut for resale. He joined Yehu to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal and coconut for resale.

loans.name: Karama

texts.en:
Karama is a married man who has been blessed with seven children. Five are in school and two are underage. He lives at their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

He has operated a fish-selling business for the past three years, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. He faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation and stiff competition.

With the loan, he wants to purchase bundles of fish for resale. He dreams of expanding his business and establishing a business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish for resale.

loans.name: Laura

texts.en: Laura is from Taronik village. She lives there with her husband and 27-year-old son. To take care of the family's needs, Laura, with the help of her husband, are  engaged in the cultivation of wheat potatoes, cucumbers, tomatoes, watermelon and grass. They realize the agricultural products in the local market, which is the main source of the family's income. To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way and to develop it further, Laura needs a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase watermelon seeds, fertilizer, hire workers to harvest the land and buy some supplies to renovate the greenhouse. Laura and her family highly rely on the good will of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed amount of the loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for watermelon seeds, fertilizer, hire workers to harvest the land and buy some supplies to renovate the greenhouse

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more wax cotton and cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Maria Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is one of the first clients of Kubo Financiero, and this is her story.

Remedios is married and has two sons. She sells different products through a catalog, such as shoes, clothes, cosmetics, etc. She has been working in sales for the last 18 years. At the beginning of her career, she only sold to her neighbors. Over time, she has been expanding to some office workers and referrals from repeat clients.

She is asking for a loan to increase her product offering and be better able to serve her client needs.

loans.use: To buy shoes for sale through a catalog

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander tiene 42 años de edad, no fue a una escuela por razones de no haber cerca de donde él viva, pero poco a poco fue luchando y pudo aprender a leer y escribir, está acompañado su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y al cuida de los 2 hijos, de los cuales solo una niña va a la escuela.

Él hace diferente tipos de trabajo, mencionando algunos podemos decir que se dedica a la agricultura, es vendedor en lo buses, trabaja en la alcaldía, todo lo aprendió por la necesidad de tener un ingreso al hogar, tiene cultivada una hectárea de maíz, recolecta todo el metal de hierro y bronce que consigue y posteriormente los vende, también cuando no trabaja en nada de lo mencionado anteriormente vende atol en los buses que transitan de una ciudad a otra, el trabajo lo tiene cerca de la casa y el recorrido lo hace a pie y lo hace de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm.

El préstamo será invertido para comprar abonos y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz que ya tiene sembrado.
Alexander espera seguir adelante trabajando para darle lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Alexander is 42 years old. He did not attend school because there wasn't one close to where he lived, but bit by bit he fought on and was able to learn to read and write. His spouse is a homemaker and looks after their two children, of whom only one daughter goes to school.

Alexander does different types of work. He works in agriculture and he works at city hall. He also collects all of the iron and bronze metal he can find in order to sell it later. Also, when he doesn't have work, he sells atol (a masa-based drink) on buses that go between cities. He learned all of this out the need to bring home an income. 

He has planted a hectare of maize. His work is close to home and he gets there on foot. He works from 8:00 am to 4:00 pm. 

Alexander will invest this loan in compost and fertilizer for the maize crops that he has already planted. Alexander hopes to continue working and moving forward in order to support his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer to grow the maize he has planted.

loans.name: Mesias

texts.en:
Mesias has been married to Rosa for the past 17 years, and they have three sons, ages 15, 13 and 8. 

Mesias was born in the state of Oaxaca but moved to Mexico City when he was young. He has been living in the same neighborhood for the last 22 years.  

Mesias sells oil, lubricants and filters for cars, and he also provides car repair services. He has one employee and opens every day of the week from 9 A.M. to 8 P.M. He started the business 26 years ago. 

He is asking for a loan to buy oil, lubricants and filters for his auto repair shop.

Mesias says that his biggest accomplishment has been to provide financial stability for his family. He bought a piece of land and his next challenge is to build a house for his family.

loans.use: To buy oil, lubricants and filters and other products for his auto shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, palm oil and cooking seasonings for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more plastic bowls, buckets, plastic chairs and food containers for resale.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a married woman with nine children. Two are in school and the rest are adults. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past four years, she has been selling cows and goats at the market to the general public. The main challenge for her business has been unstable market prices. 

She joined Yehu in order to gain access to funds. She is requesting a loan to purchase cows and goats for her business.

loans.use: to purchase cows and goats for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, pure water and soap for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, pure water and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, Pure Water and soap for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, cooking oil and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, pure water and soap for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more chains, earrings and creams to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers to expand her business.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is a married woman with nine children, three of whom are in school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Mwaka has operated a cereals shop business at the market for the past five years, selling to passersby and neighbours. She cited seasonality as her major challenge in the business.

With the loan, she wants to purchase sacks of maize for resale and pay transportation costs. She joined Yehu to get financial support.
